text: Ej kasone, imon ovardaed, az on cizhoi pokizai ʙolazzati halol, ki ruzii sumo kardaem, ʙixured va maʙosed ʙa monandi kofirone, ki pokizahoro harom mehisoʙand va palidihoro halol mesumorand. Va sukri ne'mathoi ʙuzurgi Alloh, ʙo dil va zaʙon kuned. Agar sumo amri Uro ʙa co ovarda ʙosed va tanho Uro iʙodat kuned va ʙa U sarik naored
